Package controller

Interface IControllerForDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
Controller
public interface IControllerForDao
This interface is used to provide methods for DAO.

  • Method Details

    • save

      <T> T save(T entity)
      This method is used to save an entity.
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to be saved
      Returns:
      the saved entity

    • update

      void update(int id1, int id2, double time)
      This method is used to update a Simulation and Order entities.
      Parameters:
      id1 - the id of the Simulation to be updated.
      id2 - the id of the Order to be updated.
      time - completion time of the Order.

    • find

      <T> T find(Class<T> type, int id)
      This method is used to find an entity by its id.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the entity to be found
      id - the id of the entity to be found
      Returns:
      the found entity

    • findAll

      <T> List<T> findAll(Class<T> type)
      This method is used to find all entities of a certain type.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the entities to be found
      Returns:
      a list of all entities of the given type
